item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (439 points | 126 comments)
2. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (50 points | 94 comments)
3. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (23 points | 2 comments)
4. Move Fast and Abandon Things (227 points | 70 comments)
5. Winamp Legacy player source code (461 points | 208 comments)
6. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (6 points | discuss)
7. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (84 points | 52 comments)
8. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (102 points | 20 comments)
9. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (124 points | 30 comments)
10. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (120 points | 73 comments)
11. 45 years ago CompuServe connected the world before the World Wide Web (54 points | 40 comments)
12. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (12 points | discuss)
13. The Quest to Build a Telescope on the Moon (93 points | 50 comments)
14. In 1870, Lord Rayleigh used oil and water to calculate the size of molecules (517 points | 176 comments)
15. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (127 points | 110 comments)
16. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (193 points | 105 comments)
17. DOJ accuses Visa of debit network monopoly, impacts price of 'nearly everything' (24 points | discuss)
18. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (129 points | 56 comments)
19. Show HN: I Wrote a Book on Java (540 points | 147 comments)
20. Two new Gemini models, reduced 1.5 Pro pricing, increased rate limits, and more (128 points | 74 comments)
21. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (154 points | 26 comments)
22. Life without Aadhaar digital identity in India (43 points | 31 comments)
23. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (71 points | 39 comments)
24. Euripedes Unbound (18 points | 1 comment)
25. I designed a Dieter Rams-inspired iPhone dock (1414 points | 333 comments)
26. One Collatz Coincidence (72 points | 21 comments)
27. What, Me Worry? The Art and Humor of Mad Magazine (224 points | 104 comments)
28. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (436 points | 85 comments)
29. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (236 points | 58 comments)
30. Inside a Ferroelectric RAM Chip (132 points | 67 comments)
